channel.title: Wordpress plugin: Link to my landing page after every blog post
channel.description:
Hi all,
On my [blog][1], how do I create a link at the end of every blog post providing a link to my [eBook landing page][2].
Is there a free wordpress plug in out there that you recommend.
This link would be like , "if you like this blog post, please subscribe to my eBook".
[1]: http://CongenialApps.com [2]: http://CongenialApps.com/Books
